Reviews.Title: small, cute, very good price
Reviews.Author: G. Hodill "GCrews"
Reviews.Content: the screen is indeed responsive, the phone itself does not respond as fast as I would like, but it is certainly not slow or anything, the only complaint I have is there is a slight delay when turning the phone to use the qwerty keyboard.  The Nokia operating system is new to me, was a little  hard to get used to but I really like it.  The on board software is easy to use.The only reason I don't give five stars is the MMS configuration.  I managed to do it wrong and caused the phone to crash continuously.  This was resolved by removing the sim card and resetting to factory default.  Also the reason for the problem might be because of the Simple Mobile network.  I chose this phone mainly for the reason that it has the 1700 mhz bandwidth to handle SimpleMobile's 3G network.

Reviews.Title: Mostly OK
Reviews.Author: Oleg Margulis
Reviews.Content: Here are the points I considered while shopping my next unlocked cell phone:1. Form factor2. Price3. GSM quad-band4. 3G which works on US T-Mobile5. WiFi (which is purely optional because of #4)No Android phone matched my criteria, so I decided to give Nokia a try.Asha 311 generally did not disappoint me. It's pretty nice phone with responsive touch screen, and it is perfectly combines all five unmentioned points in functioning order.The dark side of this phone is {as usual with Nokia} software. I would rate this phone with 7 stars If they would dare to put Android inside, but unfortunately that is not the case.Application availability is also not a Nokia's strongest side, but that is not in my wish list, so I'm perfectly fine with what Nokia appstore offers.To me, the most annoying is the phonebook, especially how does it present a caller. I've subscribed on T-Mobile name service which supposed to present caller name if it is disclosed to network. Everything works fine, except of that if name is NOT known to network then phone displays "UNKNOWN NAME" even if this number is in my local phonebook !! And there is no damned way to override that in settings !! I'm always curious what are software architects thinking about when deciding to do such things ..Also, these endless S40-specific popup windows, confirmations and dialogs are real sucks. I don't understand why do they need to warn me with "battery low" popup every few minutes ?? I can now disclose one of the top secrets of mobile CPU industry - such pop-up windows are causing battery to die sooner !!!! Hey Nokia architects - don't you want to make your phone more power-efficient ?? PLEASE REMOVE ALL YOUR POPUPS ASAP !!!But again - overall Asha 311 is nice phone, that's why I rated it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: No Good!
Reviews.Author: Jadedone
Reviews.Content: I got rip-off with this phone, it was really the company or person who sold it to me not Amazon.  This cell phone did not work at all in my country.  Looks can be deceiving, the cell phone looks great, but quality was crappy.  Never again!

Reviews.Title: booklet
Reviews.Author: anel kumar
Reviews.Content: the instruction booklet is all written in japanese its not worth buying itand look like the product is cheap quality

Reviews.Title: wired charger
Reviews.Author: Fanfan
Reviews.Content: The phone charger doesn't match sockets, which means you have to use the adapter provided. The problem is that the charger and adapter don't match so well. I use the charger of my previous Nokia phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice little phone.
Reviews.Author: J. Cassada
Reviews.Content: For the price it is unbeatable. We ultimately returned it because the touch screen qwerty was way too small for texting. If you know someone who's comfortable texting alphanumerically, then I highly recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Efren Aliendres
Reviews.Content: A pesar de lo mal que le ha ido a Nokia como compañia el producto se adapta al usuario. Recomendado para usuario que requieran funciones basicas

Reviews.Title: genial
Reviews.Author: EDUARDO
Reviews.Content: llego a la fecha indicada en buenas condiciones sin ningun inconveniente . .. . . .. . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Lo mejor
Reviews.Author: Francisco Gamboa Fallas
Reviews.Content: Excelente servicio, la entrega es muy rápida... .... .... .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. .. ..

Reviews.Title: A great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Mr. Bloksa
Reviews.Content: i was looking for a fancy and simple present for my wife, she just doesn't like high technology cell phones, so this was the perfect gift for her, she loved it

Reviews.Title: I like the appearance of the phone.
Reviews.Author: huanhuan
Reviews.Content: Why does this phone not have Chinese language? All Chinese words are shown error codes!  If it has Chinses languge, I will introduce my friends to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone !
Reviews.Author: Evaristo E. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I purchase this phone for a love one in Costa Rica.  She love it and it work very well there.  I am planning on purchasing two more for  some other friends there.

Reviews.Title: highly recommended!
Reviews.Author: rache r.
Reviews.Content: got phone dec 23, nice phoneeasy and simple to operate,good for the price, came asdescribed..  luv it! :)

Reviews.Title: It does the Job
Reviews.Author: Jason Russell
Reviews.Content: Nokia phones traditionally deliver durability an efficiency in functionality and the Asha 311 is no different. Overall I am very satisfied with my purchase. It meets all my expectations for a phone in this price range. The negative is that I did not get a 2GB memory card as advertised

Reviews.Title: Robinson Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Robinson
Reviews.Content: Buenas tardes a todos y todas recomiendo tan excelente equipo de telefono fue entrgado a tiempo y llego sin inconveneiente

Reviews.Title: Change in the memory stick
Reviews.Author: Maurice
Reviews.Content: The phones didn't bring one memory stick of 4gb, the phones were bought with a memory stick of 4gb,this is not correct, because, in the description is clear what it is included one memory of 4gb and this point, apparently, is so recurrent in this seller. I am upset by this change in the product. The phones were sent with a memory of 2gb.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: nancy
Reviews.Content: Phone doesn't well. Company would not contact me. Will never purchase another one. Total waste of time and money with this phone.

Reviews.Title: items sent on time
Reviews.Author: maiguara
Reviews.Content: I have not actually seen the package, it must be sent to Venezuela. But I can say that it was sent on time to Miami. When you see the cell, I will be in a position to make any criticism, not before. Thanks a lot!

Reviews.Title: Not my type
Reviews.Author: Junior
Reviews.Content: was dis appointed in this phone, it is a lot smaller than I thought and very limited, not quite as stylish as it looks

Reviews.Title: That is not what i was expected
Reviews.Author: Tatiana Dyakiv
Reviews.Content: that phone was look like a toy from Toys"r"us store.Very small and light,all plastic ,made in India.Maximum price could be $20-25
